events.name: The Whimsical Blasphemy Show with Mercy Maelica
events.description: Join award-winning internationally touring recording artist and D.C. affiliate Director of Black Nonbelievers Rogiérs Fibby as he lectures regarding intra-community oppressive dynamics, sexual identities and revolution in the Caribbean communities. In addition to his work with Alicia Keys, Robert Glasper, Mo’Nique and others, he works closely with the American Humanist Association, Freedom From Religion Foundation, the Religious Freedom Forum, the Secular Coalition of America and serves on the board of the Washington Area Secular Humanists. Q&A to follow the lecture. Please join us in one of our three Back Parlors for this event.

events.name: TST Sober Faction: Sobriety Without Superstition
events.description: TST Sober Faction's co-directors will hold a meet & greet on April 29 to introduce themselves & the TST Sober Faction Campaign & discuss how Hex relates to their cause.

events.name: Satanic Show + Tell Live
events.description: Interact with La Carmina and Dr John Skutlin, hosts of the new 'Satanic Show + Tell' show on TST TV. Guests are invited to appear on-screen to show off their Satanic possessions, and tell the stories behind them. We look forward to seeing your devilish collections! Watch our show, 'Satanic Show + Tell,' on The Satanic Temple TV

events.name: Salem Witch Wiles
events.description: Join Thomas O'Brien Vallor, The Estate's resident Salem Witch for a conversation about Hexennacht.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: A Happy Hooven Home: Goats!
events.description: Livestream of goats. Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
